Service Details: - Provides counselling services at no cost for those struggling with problematic gambling, those affected by someone else's gambling, concerned family members or those wanting education or information about problem gambling- Also offers group treatment option- Office locations in Kelowna and Penticton
Eligibility: Services are available to all age groups
Address & Map: 2040 Springfield Rd, Ste 207Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9N7View MapQuest Map
